title: Sawbones: The Chattanooga Medicine Company
description:
This week on Sawbones, live from the historic Ryman Auditorium, hear the patent medicine company so insidious they made Dolly Parton sing about laxatives on one of the biggest stages in country music.

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin McElroy)
